apple_vendor_description: This heartwarming emoji, seen on Apple devices, portrays a loving couple sharing a tender kiss, with the woman having a medium-dark skin tone and the man a light skin tone.  Apple’s masterful use of glossy 3D shading and soft rounded edges gives the figures a warm, inviting glow and a palpable sense of closeness.  The gentle realism of the lighting on Apple’s design highlights the romantic connection, making it a perfect symbol for expressing deep affection, partnership, or a sweet, intimate moment.
